title: What’s on TV This Week: ‘The White Lotus’ and Lots of Spooky Movies
description: The HBO series begins its second season. And we rounded up some scary movies to get you prepped for Halloween.
dc:creator: Shivani Gonzalez
media:description: From left: Aubrey Plaza, Will Sharpe, Theo James and Meghann Fahy in “The White Lotus.”
